name: Spa Eastman

reviews.text: When you want to relax, enjoy great food, feel like you are worth a million $, this is the place to go. Indulge yourself
reviews.title: Back to earthiness

likes.liked: — Even the cheaper pavilliosn were beautiful,focus on nature, organic living
likes.disliked: — Huge premise -travel on dirt road with flipflops -no slippers

reviews.title: Great Spa at a Surprisingly Good Value
reviews.text: The place is WOW! The staff is very professionnal but yet warm and friendly and the owner, Jocelyna is just like BUTTER!

reviews.title: Very Disappointing
reviews.text: I stayed for 10 days and I did not want to leave...

reviews.title: JUST GO!
reviews.text: If you only have one life to live, Spa Eastman must me included in it.

Stayed for 3 nights. Expectations were high as this destination spa has always been rated as one of the top in Canada and I was expecting deluxe luxury. To be blunt, I was disappointed and consider the establishment more of a 3-star than 4 or 5-star resort. Here’s what I liked best and least of Spa Eastman:
reviews.title: Good for 3.5 stars

reviews.text: - Personnel are well-trained and very courteous (spa, reception, restaurant).
reviews.title: A Gift to Myself!
The Spa Eastman, an exceptionnal place!
reviews.text: - Workshops and conferences cover broad range of interesting topics on mental and physical well-being. Excellent, knowledgeable speakers.

description: The ultimate health & wellness vacation!Spa Eastman was named one of America’s Healthiest Spas by Health Magazine. It was also named one of the best spas of the World, as part of Spa Finder’s Readers’ Choice Awards in the “Best Affordable Spa” category. If for you a vacation means shaping up, feeling well and relaxed, enjoying exceptional spa treatments, eating delicious healthful meals, then your perfect destination is Spa Eastman!
